alert_bookmarked_this_spot: Added this spot to your Wishlist!
error_already_withdrawed: You've already withdrawed for this service. If you wish to re-register, please contact to: support+compathy-web@wanderlust.co.jp
error_unknown: Sorry, but some problem occurred. Please come back in some minutes. error:
error_sorry: Server error has occurred. Please re-try some minutes later. or please contact us at support+compathy-web@wanderlust.co.jp.
error_refresh: Server error has occurred. Browser will be reloaded. If you always get error,  please contact us at support+compathy-web@wanderlust.co.jp.
error_please_login: Your session has timed out. Please login again.
error_access_forbidden: The specified content does not exist, or you are not allowed to access it. By clicking the OK button you'll be redirected to the Main Page.
error_save_past_plan: Your plan's dates have already passed. Please update them before attempting to save again.
search_explain: You can find variety of travel collections and get many tips such as reviews and exact locations for your next travels.
compathy_explain: Compathy is a travel collection service you can connect to the world with travelogs!
confirm_leave_page_losing_data: You still have unsaved changes. Do you really want to leave this page?
confirm_leave_page_with_draft: leave this page without publishing logbook? (it will remain as draft.)
confirm_delete_wishlist: Are you sure to delete it from wishlist?
confirm_withdraw: Are you sure to withdraw from Compathy? Your data will be deleted and won't be restored.
confirm_back_to_draft: Once you edit, it turns back to 'Draft' status so you need to 'Post' again after you finish your edition.
official_account_note: This is Compathy official account. Sometimes the user cannot respond to your comments.
spot_not_found_alphabet: お探しの場所が見つかりませんか？場所名は、アルファベットで入力してみてください。
spot_not_found_register: the place you're looking for has not been registered yet. Let's register from <u>here</u>
spot_not_found_area: Sorry, but search range is too wide. please input city/area name to the form above.
Gateway Time-out: Server error has occurred. Please re-try some minutes later.
Bad Gateway: Server error has occurred. Please re-try some minutes later.
error: Server error has occurred. Please re-try some minutes later.
upload_error: The upload couldn't be completed. Please remove some of the files and try again.
plan__confirm_delete_day: The selected day's contents will also be deleted. Do you still want to proceed?
plan__confirm_delete_days: By reducing the number of days of your plan you will delete the extra days and their planned items. Do you still want to proceed?
plan__saved_body: You can see a preview of this plan via your mobile phone too.
plan__spot_search_placeholder_list: Select the country / area you want to visit
plan__spot_search_placeholder_keyword: Select from the list, or input a keyword
plan__confirm_back_to_home: Do you want to quit this preview and go back to the top page?
plan__added_to_plan_title: The spot was added to the plan successfully!
plan__added_to_wishlist: The spot was added to your Wishlist
plan__deleted_from_wishlist: The spot was removed from your Wishlist
plan__refresh_dates:
Your plan's dates have already passed and that may affect your hotel search results.
Would you like to update the dates now?
plan__old_dates_hotel_search:
Since Day <%= day %> (<%= original %>) is a past date, we are showing you today's availability (<%= today %>) as a reference.
<%= suffix %>
plan__old_dates_hotel_search_pc: You can change the search scope by selecting a different day or by changing your trip's dates.
plan__old_dates_hotel_search_sp: If you'd like to update your trip's dates, please go back to the plan's top page and use the 'Edit basic info' button.
